content: tip of lh needle pick up loop from st in the row below twist it and place onto rh needle 4 yo and pass the next two sts over the yo and off the rh needle one at at time in this order first the second st and then the first st video tutorial for bobble https //youtu be/t8tplvdqsec note this video was made for my heartbeat shawl pattern but the bobble technique is the same for this pattern mds make double stitch used in the german short row with yarn in front slip next st from lh needle to rh needle pull yarn to back of work pulling the legs of the stitch up with a little tug so the stitch looks like 2 sts resolve the ds on the next row by working the legs together as one stitch page 3 of 7 lincoln baby blanket @2024 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support- jennits12@gmail com lincoln - a baby blanket stitch pattern mult of 26 sts also provided in chart form at the end of the patten row 1 rs *k13 p13 repeat from * row 2 ws *k13 p13 repeat from * row 3 *k4tog yo k1 5 times yo ssssk p3 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p5 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p3 repeat from * row 4 *k3 yarn forward slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops k5 slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops k3 p13 repeat from * row 5 *k13 p3 lpcdec p1 rpcdec p3 repeat from * row 6 *k13 p13 repeat from * row 7 *k4tog yo k1 5 times yo ssssk p6 mb p6 repeat from * row 8 *k13 p13 repeat from * row 9 *k13 p5 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p1 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p5 repeat from * page 4 of 7 lincoln baby blanket @2024 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support- jennits12@gmail com lincoln - a baby blanket row 10 *k5 slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops wyif k1 slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops wyif k5 p13 repeat from * row 11 *k4tog yo k1 5 times yo ssssk p3 rpcdec p1 lpcdec p3 repeat from * rows12-14 *k13 p13 repeat from * rows15-16 *p13 k13 repeat from * row 17 *p3 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p5 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p3 k4tog yo k1 5 times yo ssssk repeat from * row 18 *p13 k3 yarn forward slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops k5 slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops k3 repeat from * row 19 *p3 lpcdec p1 rpcdec p3 k13 repeat from * row 20 *p13 k13 repeat from * row
